title: New Champion Concept - Flippy
body:
Flippy is a Dolphin.

He has 6 smaller dolphins surrounding him going round in circles a bit like Aurelian Sol.

his auto attack sees the closest circling dolphin to the front dash forward hitting the enemy before returning to the group.

For his Q_ all  the smaller dolphins all rush forward hitting the enemy for damage before returning.

For his W_ the small dolphins move in tighter and spin faster providing extra close range damage and a shield for Flippy.

For his E_ the dolphins go into formation gaining movement and jumping walls.

For his R_  Flippy can dive into the enemy with a stun and then backflip out.


Riot please make this champion as my girlfriend loves Dolphins and it is the only way I can get her to play League of Legends with me.

replies.body: Has she seen nami? She has a dolphin skin
